synopsis.text: Together with his friends, high school student Shun Tokinoya embarks on a mission to save their beloved e-sports café, 'FOX ONE,' from debt. After his father's tragic death forced him to abandon his gaming passion, Shun now juggles school, work, and supporting his family. When he learns about the café's financial troubles, Shun and his friends enter the prestigious 'Xaxerion Championship,' hoping to win the prize money and repay their debts. As they face fierce competition, Shun must confront his guilt and rediscover his love for gaming to lead his team to victory. Join Shun and his friends as they navigate the thrilling world of online gaming and strive to save their cherished gaming sanctuary.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
